install.name: teamstandings
install.author: Mo Kelly
install.description: Display team standings according to a point scheme

param.name: StandingType
param.label: Two Types - Won/Loss Percentage and Point Assignment
param.description: Display one or two columns of product in catalog

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable). this allows individual module styling.

param.name: WinPoints
param.label: Point Assignment - Win Points
param.description: The number of points a team gets for a win.

param.name: TiePoints
param.label: Point Assignment - Tie Points
param.description: The number of points a team gets for a tie.

param.name: LoosePoints
param.label: Point Assignment - Loose Points
param.description: The number of points a team gets for a Loss.
